h2_title: Giant Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide
content: After defeating the boss, climb the arm that touches the ground and you'll meet the monkey again. Let the cutscene  and you'll get the Skandha of Consciousness.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Giant_Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Giant Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Giant Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the boss, climb the arm that touches the ground and you'll meet the monkey again. Let the cutscene  and you'll get the Skandha of Consciousness.
